AppointmentInvitee.name: AppointmentInvitee
AppointmentInvitee.description: Represents information about the participant and resources required for creating an appointment invitation URL.

IsPrimaryResource.description: Indicates whether a service resource that's used to book an appointment is a primary resource. The default value is false.

IsRequiredResource.description: Indicates whether a service resource is required to book an appointment. The default value is false.

LastReferencedDate.description: Date on which the appointment invitee record was last modified. Its label in the user interface is Last Modified Date.

LastViewedDate.description: Date on which the appointment invitee record was last viewed.

Name.description: Auto-assigned number that identifies the appointment invitee.

ParticipantServiceResourceId.description: Service resource who's assigned to the appointment invitation.
